title: (PROOF) Riot grading system is broken (pics included)!
body:
To make long story short and get to the point check stats on the pics for all categories and tell me is this grading really fair.
Pls comment your thoughts,thanks. 

 http://imgur.com/5ZccHgL


















 http://imgur.com/a/O7Sjj

















 http://imgur.com/pofVl7d

replies.body: They are two totally different champions and roles.  Per the [grading ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide)system, it isn't scoring you against other players in your match, but others who played your champion and role.  Among other players who have played Lucian and in that specific role, you earned an S which is pretty great.  It doesn't take anything about Vlad's performance into consideration.  Hope that helps with clearing things up!

on top of what prices said, as a zyra main, I found it much easier to get an S+ grade on zyra support when Dragon Sorceress Zyra came out. Those S+ grades normally should have just yielded me an A- grade or so.

Dem influx of crappy zyra players (all with the skin) makes me cringe.
